author: Second Wind
description:
This video is brought to you by GameMaker, the free, fast, and easy-to-use 2D game engine that’s helped power modern classics like UFO 50, Antonblast, and Yahtzee’s Starstruck Vagabond – https://opr.as/SecondWind-3

This week on Hidden Gems, KC, Jesse, and Jess play Neon Abyss 2 -- https://store.steampowered.com/app/2235200/Neon_Abyss_2/

If you dig Hot Monday Energy, consider supporting us over on Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Check out some of our lovely merch over at our DFTBA store -- https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind

Get your Adventure is Nigh! plushies over at Shark Robot -- https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind

Listen to the Hidden Gems songs here -- 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bUWISImXpRQ
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=szSjVtdyO6w
title: Checking Out the Chaotic Action of Neon Abyss 2 | Hidden Gems

author: Second Wind
description:
In today's episode, J & Ludo delve deep into open world design practices and what some developers still misunderstand about it all these years later.

Support us on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

Second Wind Merch: 
https://store.dftba.com/collections/second-wind
https://sharkrobot.com/collections/second-wind

Music used in order of appearance:
Intruder - Stray OST
The Abyss - Hyper Light Drifter OST
Checking in - Celeste OST
The Notebooks - Stray OST
Secret Lab - Stray OST
title: What Devs STILL Misunderstand About Open World Design | Design Delve

author: Second Wind
description:
On this week’s episode of Windbreaker, Yahtzee, Marty, and JM8 chat about the moments in games that grind a replay to a halt.

If you dig the stuff we make, consider supporting us over at Patreon -- https://www.patreon.com/SecondWindGroup

title: The Point in a Game That Kills the Replay | Windbreaker Podcast
